comments: He is a statistician in real life and knows you don\'t want his job. His approach is to allow you to use statistics in your life and better understand statistical results. He is funny and caters to a class not interested in stats, by not being math or formula heavy - but to understand and apply concepts appropriately.
He\'s very funny! Who wouldn\'t love a guy that juggles IN class :) He\'s tough, I learned a lot. He\'s a good teacher & the weekly exams help prepare you for the final.
